arm_group.description: unstimulated patients prior to surgery,ileostomy closure surgery without prior stimulation of efferent limb.
stimulation of the efferent limb of the ileostomy prior to ileostomy closure.

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of this study is to compare  postoperative ileus between stimulated and unstimulated
      patients prior to ileostomy closure.

clinical_study.brief_title: Stimulation of Efferent Loop Prior to Ileostomy Closure

detailed_description.textblock:
Stimulation was performed ten days prior to the intervention, through the efferent limb of
      the ileostomy with 500 cc of a thickening substance (saline and nutritional thickener)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  protective ileostomy after rectal cancer surgery

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  under 18 years

intervention.description: daily stimulation of efferent loop prior to surgery (ileostomy closure)

primary_outcome.time_frame: within the first days after surgery
